briefTitle: Pattern of Clinical Presentation of Different Breast Disease in Surgical Opd at BPKIHS
officialTitle: Pattern of Clinical Presentation of Different Breast Disease in Surgical Opd at BPKIHS
conditions: Breast Disease, Breast Neoplasms, Breast Pain, Breast Fibroadenoma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Clinical symptoms associated with breast disease
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients presenting in Surgical OPD with Breast and related complaints

Exclusion Criteria:

* Those who deny consent for participation
